description.plain: Cults is an American indie pop band formed in New York City in 2010 and led by Brian Oblivion (vocals, guitar, keyboards, percussion) and Madeline Follin (vocals). They dated throughout the creation and release of their first album, Cults. They did end up breaking up but they continued creating music. They are still active creating their 60’s pop sounding dream hazy music with Madelines high vocals harmonizing.

body.plain: Cults is an American indie pop band formed in New York City in 2010 and led by Brian Oblivion (vocals, guitar, keyboards, percussion) and Madeline Follin (vocals). They dated throughout the creation and release of their first album, Cults. They did end up breaking up but they continued creating music. They are still active creating their 60’s pop sounding dream hazy music with Madelines high vocals harmonizing.

songs.title: Always Forever

description.plain:
“Always Forever” is the bittersweet ballad from Cults, which is a true testament to love. When asked about the new indie sounds that were brought with the song and album, bandmember Brian Oblivion aptly quipped;

There’s a feeling our generation has. The feeling there’s always something better around the corner, that everyone is born to be a star. The feeling that life is waiting for you, and yet it’s not happening. All of that is static.

songs.embed_content: Read “Always Forever” by Cults on Genius

songs.lyrics:
39 ContributorsAlways Forever Lyrics[Verse 1]
You and me always forever
We could stay alone together
You and me always forever
Say you'll stay, never be severed

[Chorus]
You know you've got me in your pocket
You don't just have to wait around
You know I keep you in my locket
Just come here and we can settle down
[Verse 2]

Darling, don't get away right now

[Chorus]

You don't just have to wait around

Just come here and we can settle down

[Bridge]
Oh, darling, it's alarming to think of us apart

[Chorus]

songs.title: Gilded Lily

description.plain:
When asked about the meaning of the song, the band described it as such: “We love that song too. It was one of the last ones we wrote so it’s still fresh for us. I guess its kinda about getting older and people moving out of your life, and knowing that you’ll still be a part of each others lives forever? Its weird to write this stuff down.”

Source:
https://www.reddit.com/r/indieheads/comments/75qp6l/cults_here_ama/do88wpp/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=ios_app&utm_name=iossmf&context=3

songs.lyrics:
25 ContributorsGilded Lily Lyrics[Verse 1]
Now it's been long enough to talk about it
I've started not to doubt it, just wrap my head around it
I remember when you told me it's an everyday decision
But with my double vision, how was I supposed to see the way?

[Pre-Chorus]
Haven't I given enough, given enough?
Haven't I given enough, given enough?
Haven't I given enough, given enough?
Haven't I given enough, given enough?
[Chorus]
Always the fool with the slowest heart
But I know you'll take me with you
We'll live in spaces between walls

[Verse 2]
Every city's got a graveyard
A service bought and paid for
Now I'm sleeping in the backyard
Passing out as night turns into day

[Pre-Chorus]
Haven't I given enough, given enough?
Haven't I given enough, given enough?
Haven't I given enough, given enough?
Haven't I given enough, given enough?

[Chorus]
Always the fool with the slowest heart
But I know you'll take me with you
We'll live in spaces between walls

[Bridge]
Go and stretch out my arms long as they need to be
Turn off all alarms and lie to me
Go and stretch out my arms long as they need to be
Turn off all alarms and lie to me

songs.lyrics:

'Cause those bad things, I always saw them coming for me

Show 'em that your color is black
